segments.text: This kitchen drawing shows a typical indoor scene with people going about their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there drying a plate, but the sink behind her is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing everywhereâ€”it's filthy and wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, soaking her shoe without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets will be warped from all that moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the boy is invading the cookie jar like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool is all crooked and unsafe; what a sloppy way to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, palm out, begging for stolen goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're making a sneaky mess of the whole routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in the woman's hand looks crumpled and damp already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat, which only highlights the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such disregard for cleanliness and safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just gross with all the unnoticed hazards piling up.
segments.speaker: PAR
